  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/110769</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110769</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tropska Afrika - zastave</string>
            <string language="en">Tropical Africa - flags</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tropisches Afrika - Markierungsfahnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Afrique tropicale - indicateurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">África tropical - bandeiras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Africa tropicale - bandierine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροπική Αφρική - σημαίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">África tropical - indicadores</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Natančno opazovanje, primerjanje, prepoznavanje značilnosti, po katerih se objekti naloge med seboj razlikujejo. Glede na prepoznavanje lastnosti, razvijanje sposobnosti razvrščanja. Dodan je miselni vzorec za izpolnjevanje po svoji izbiri</string>
            <string language="en">Careful comparison, classification and observation of different flags of tropical Africa and how to recognize them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovanje</string>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">geografija</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">država</string>
            <string language="en">country</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zastava</string>
            <string language="en">flag</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorsichtiger Vergleich, Klassifikation und 
Beobachtung der unterschiedlichen Markierungsfahnen von tropischem 
Afrika und wie man sie erkennt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparaison, classification et observation 
soigneuses de différents indicateurs de l'Afrique tropicale et 
comment les identifier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparação, classificação e observação 
cuidadosas de bandeiras diferentes de África tropical e como 
reconhecê-las.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronto, classificazione ed osservazione 
attenti delle bandierine differenti dell'Africa tropicale e come 
riconoscerle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσεκτικές σύγκριση, ταξινόμηση και παρατήρηση των 
διαφορετικών σημαιών της τροπικής Αφρικής και πώς να τους 
αναγνωρίσει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparación, clasificación y observación 
cuidadosas de diversos indicadores de África tropical y cómo 
reconocerlos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Markierungsfahne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">indicador</string>
          </keyword>
